text: The Mad Doctor is a Mickey Mouse cartoon released in 1933. It is known as the first appearance of the title character "The Mad Doctor", or "Dr. XXX". It was the 52nd Mickey Mouse short film, and the second of that year. ==Voice cast== * Mickey Mouse: Walt Disney * Pluto: Pinto Colvig * The Mad Doctor: Billy Bletcher ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 movies Category:1930s science fiction movies Category:Disney animated movies
title: The Mad Doctor (1933 movie)
